actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an individual a credit for certain household and dependent care expenses necessary for gainful employment.

summary.text: Allows an individual a tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 for household and dependent care expenses necessary for gainful employment. Limits such tax credit to $150 per month. Imposes restrictions on such credit when an individual's adjusted gross income reaches $18,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an individual a credit for certain household and dependent care expenses necessary for gainful employment.
